headline: Northrop Clinches Deal to Support E-2D Advanced Hawkeye Jets
summary: NOC lands a $46.7M Navy contract to support E-2D Advanced Hawkeye jets, boosting its role in aerial command and control systems.

headline: Counter-UAS (C-UAS) Systems Market Research Report 2025-2033 Featuring DeDrone, DroneShield, Elbit Systems, Leonardo, Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman, Rafael , RTX , SRC, Thales, Boeing
summary: The report forecasts C-UAS technology trends from 2025-2033, evaluating markets geographically, especially in North America, Europe, and Asia-Pacific. It explores detection and mitigation methods for drones, noting technological advances like AI integration. headline: Northrop Grumman’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Northrop Grumman’s first quarter was marked by operational headwinds and financial results that fell short of Wall Street’s expectations, leading to a significant negative market reaction. Management largely attributed the underperformance to delays in government contract awards and a substantial pretax loss from the B-21 bomber program, which resulted from higher manufacturing and material costs as the company scaled up production.
